citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
A 2-year-old male Australian Shephard dog ("Axel", microchip #900235004944160) had matted hair on his back end.
There were numerous round balls of hair and organic matter under the base of the tail area. The licensee stated that she
had not observed these mats prior to the inspection. Mats may cause discomfort, and may create or hide skin conditions
in the area under the mats. Correct by 3/1/24 by ensuring that all dogs are observed on a daily basis to ensure that issues
(including mats) are promptly identified and treated. At the time of the exit interview, the dog had been groomed and all
mats removed.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.40(b)(3) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
A 2-year-old male Australian Shephard dog ("Axel", microchip #900235004944160) had matted hair on his back end. 
There were numerous round balls of hair and organic matter under the base of the tail area. The licensee stated that she 
had not observed these mats prior to the inspection. Mats may cause discomfort, and may create or hide skin conditions 
in the area under the mats. Correct by 3/1/24 by ensuring that all dogs are observed on a daily basis to ensure that issues 
(including mats) are promptly identified and treated. At the time of the exit interview, the dog had been groomed and all 
mats removed. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
